nodes.bodyText: That's chicken-and-egg issue here. I built the image with my core changes locally to verify the test passes. We probably would have to disable this test until the next release, containing the fix, is out.

@gunnarmorling I recommend you to create a special tag like 1.2-devel and push the image to the registry so the test is passing also on CI. Then there will be a follow-up task for 1.2.0.Final/1.3 to point it elsewhere.
Done; and logged https://issues.redhat.com/browse/DBZ-2256 for reverting it.
Pushed an update to the image as per my latest change.
